text: I had a great experience with Dr Sally , nurse Vivian and nurse Pepsi . I have pain for many days for my broken tooth. It was removed fast without any pain. I haven't visited dentist for many years due to fear. But from now on , I will review with Dr Sally every 6 mth!.
Wisdom tooth removal with Dr Nina. Very patient and caring doctor. Appreciate the service. Highly recommend.

Last year I started Invisalign at Q&M with my Dentist Dr Hazel Goh. Impressed my teeth was aligned nicely (Photo attached), now I can have a better smile with teeth showedüòÅüòÅ. A lot of people were doubt how it done, do visit Q&M look for Dr Hazel Goh for more info. Thanks Dr. Hazel Goh again assist to boost my confidence with a lovely smile.

Thank you Dr. Hazel Goh for recommending dental implant for my lost toothü¶∑. You know how embarrassing it is while you laugh and there is an empty space within those teethüò∞üò∞. bad service. they said the teeth cleaning is aboand $90 to $120 when called them. in the end, the cleaning was took about a few minutes, and they charged $373.8. they charged deep clean and screeclea fee.

Dr Reuben is amazing! I had scaling and polishing done and it was a great experience! So much care and concern was put into the whole process with Dr Reuben always checking in if everything is alright and making sure to guide me through the whole process. From explaining to me each step and to breaking down what current state of my dental health, such professionalism made me not terrified of visiting the dentist anymore! The whole experience was so great that I immediately got the membership and booked my next appointment. Thank you Dr Reuben & team for helping me overcome my fear of visiting the dentist! I have certainly found my go-to dentist!
